My new favorite sunglasses! They’re so flattering and go with everything. As pictured, they’re a vibe!

These glasses are great! The quality for the price is great. The design is gorgeous and has a very classic 90's feel to it. They feel sturdy but not too heavy so not uncomfortable to wear. And they block out a good amount of sun so they're actually functional.

These are really cute sunglasses.  I ordered these as a gift for a petite teenage girl. The small ovals are a perfect size and the frames fit nicely.  The sunglasses are well-constructed, stylish, and work well in the sun.  I do want to point out: I ordered these HOPING they would be small enough to fit her nicely and they were.
I really like this pair of sunglasses. They aren’t too dark and not too light. They are a nice shape and color is great. I think they  look great and work great. I recommend for sure.

Love these glasses! All I need now is the scarf and a convertible and I will be looking like a 1960s movie star siren. These are quite wide off the side of my face, but it is part of the style of that era. Nice frames, green lenses, very stylish. Bring on the Sun!

These are stylish sunglasses!  I ordered the leopard with the brown lenses and what a classic combination!  The frame is well made, very solid and doesn't have much flex and the arms are very tight!  The leopard print is a perfect boldness!  The brown lenses block more sun than I expected, even on a day with not a cloud in the sky!  The sunglasses fit my face perfectly without bowing or pinching, and sit comfortably on the bridge of my nose.  It comes with a soft drawstring bag and a handy keychain screwdriver with both flat and Phillips heads!
My 22 year old daughter loved these sunglasses.  We live in Florida and you don't go outside without sunglasses.  These are used on a daily basis and appear to be made well.

Received this in the mail with great packaging. Sunglasses are a great option if you want something fashionable, frame is thick and durable! Also comes with a bag to put them in, tool to adjust the glasses and cloth for cleaning the lenses. I do find them a bit snug on the temples, so might be uncomfortable if you wear wider framed glasses. Overall love them.
The style is not for me, but the product seems well made and sturdy, lenses clear.  Not for small faces as the frame is very wide (the lens width from ear to ear)

What I like best about these glasses are the brown frames and tea lenses. Although the lenses are not polarized they do offer protection from the sun. They remind of the sunglasses I wore in the early 1990's.

These glasses are gorgeous! They are study, not cheap and thin plastic-y feeling. They feel nice and thick, the color is beautiful, they fit very well. Overall a great pair of stylish sunglasses. Would recommend!

I only buy inexpensive sunglasses because I have a tendency to breal or lose them. Often, they don't fit right. This pair fits great! Not too loose, not too tight. I was also pleasantly surprised that they came with not only a soft storage bag but also a cleaning cloth and a key chain screwdriver. Definitely worth the asking price. Plus they are super cute. I highly recommend.
These sunglasses are comfortable and very stylish. The frames arrived inside of a bag with a tiny screw fit for tightening frames. Cute idea for young girls costume gathering or birthday bash.
i did not like these at all they looked weird on my face and my kids, they were a little heavy for being sunglasses, they are well made though and even came with a glasses screwdriver
My wife ordered these and really like them.  Quality was pretty good considering the inexpensive price.  The style is retro but still in style.

The AIEYEZO Retro Oval Sunglasses for Women  are on the small/narrow size.  They are very cute with a retro vibe.  The come with a glass cloth, a glasses bag for storing them in and a tiny glasses screw driver.  They are non-polarized.  I would say these are way more fashion than function.  I like that they stay ontop of my head when I put them up like a hairband when going in stores.  I got the  leopard and brown color.  For the price, they are sturdy and should last.  A fun way to look cool without breaking the bank.
These sunglasses are just a lot of fun! Nice pouch they can also be used as a cleaner. They’re a great value.
I love it

These black retro sunnies are great, really well made & look good on a small face. Very similar to pairs I had in the late 90's. I was pleased the pair I received had no scratches of any kind or manufacturing defects, tried another brand that had several issues but these are perfect. Really nice, dark lenses with frames of a good weight. The glasses come with a large cleaning cloth & a carrying case. I think anyone looking for this style will be pleased with these, better quality than other similar pairs.
Love these vintage style glasses, they are so cute and comfortable. They're a nice durable plastic material. They are a bit on the larger side so if you have a petit face I would not recommend.
Fashionable sunglasses, not overly darkening but do the job. Has the great nose piece that doesn't get stuck in your hair. Only comes with a cloth bag, no hard case.

More narrow than you'd think, I have a small round face so I go for the smaller/narrower glasses but these look almost too small. The width is perfect, just the actual lense. Feel like very nice quality though and nice packaging.

I love the retro look of these glasses. The white is very cute. They come with a very nice little screwdriver. They fit my face perfect. The tint looks quite nice, it's exactly what I expected. The bag they came with is very soft. The cleaning cloth is very nice to have.
so so cute! Just what i was looking for! super fast delivery
